sentence.Network_en: And as Echo far off through the vale my sad orison rolls.
sentence.Network_cn: 我那哀伤的祈祷回荡着遥远的山谷.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French oreison, from Latin oratio(n-) 'speech' (see oration)

auth_sentence.content: The Wachowskis' solution: the orison is as flat as a wallet and acquires a third dimension only when spun.
